title: Sketch Club ipod.ipad.iphone
description:
Description
Everyone needs a drawing app and if you get just one it should totally be Sketch Club!! It combines standard digital painting and drawing tools, vector art, old school pixel art, and also new procedural tools which help you get amazing results even if you're new to working digitally. You can even record speed painting sessions, set them to music, and upload to YouTube all within the app!

Sketch Club provides not just the tools to create but also some of the motivation and inspiration through it's integrated online community. You can upload your sketches to let others rate and comment as well as enter daily challenges and fun competitions for fabulous prizes! You can see what people are creating at http://SketchClub.com 

Do you like features? Sketch Club has LOTS of those! 

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Loading and saving to over 1,000 save slots
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Undo and redo with up to 100 levels!
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Unique fluid multitouch canvas zoom and rotate up to 6400%
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Universal binary so you can use on both the iPad and iPhone/iPod touch
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ VGA and HDMI output support
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Caring developer hard at work to give you the best art tool and community possible :)

Tools
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Brush, eraser, bucket fill, fur, grass, pen, pixels, sketchy, smooth, smudge, text and vector tools! Each with their own settings and customizable options. Any tool can also be used in erase mode!
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Brush has 44 built in presets and new brushes can be created from photos, shared via e-mail and downloaded from the Sketch Club community brush library!
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Advanced smudge engine with opacity option to control how far paint is carried and blur mode to soften areas while preserving form
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Vector tool can create smoothed lines, filled shapes, and even gradients
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ All tools support freehand drawing as well as line, circle, and square shapes plus mirroring for symmetric drawings like faces!

Layers
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ 8 layers with controls for opacity, 16 blend modes, and operations like merge and copy
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Layer transform tool to move, resize, rotate, and flip layers
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Layer filters to easily adjust color, perform blurs and more!

Import/Export/Share
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Import from your photo library or iTunes sharing
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Export to e-mail in JPG, PNG, PSD and native .sketchClub formats
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Also export to Facebook, iTunes file sharing, photo library and AirPrint
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Load sketches and custom brushes directly from Mail app into Sketch Club

Community
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Tight integration with SketchClub.com community and online gallery
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Daily challenges so you always have fun fresh ideas
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Weekly competitions with prizes like gift cards, art books, styluses, and even iPads!
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Push notifications for activity on your sketches. Find out right away when people comment on your sketches, give them hearts, and when your sketches win in competitions!
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Library of shared community templates and brushes directly in the app
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Become fans of other artists and grow your own fan base
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Learn from other artists through tutorials and uploaded speed painting videos
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Forums, chat, and realtime collaborative drawing on the community whiteboard
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Be inspired by over 125,000 works of art created on the iPad, iPhone, and iPod touch!

Come join us in Sketch Club today! 

iPhone screenshots from the amazing artists Unihorse, TerraÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬otta, Shadoweddimples, Jrmjesus, and Unihorse.

Fae By McKay (featuring her co op with Abbey-Gray).
What's new in Version 1.12
Epic updates to Brush tool!
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ All new user interface for Brush settings
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ 44 customizable brush presets
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Upgraded brush editor with realtime preview
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Add custom brushes from your photo library
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Download shared community brushes
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Share brushes you create via e-mail

Other wonderful new stuff:
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ New Fill tool to flood / bucket fill large areas with ease
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ View stats on your sketch at the Upload screen
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Option to import photos in the Actions menu (you can also still do this from Layers)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Rotate -45 degree option in layer transform tool
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Brush size preview improvements
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Improved template image downloading

Also some bugs were squashed:
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Fixed display update issue with Eraser and Erase mode with mirroring
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Fixed delay starting Text strokes
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Fixed a couple tools that could sometimes cause undo remnants

Plus lots of smaller tweaks and fixes along the way. :) Have fun!!
